project_descr: Umbrella Programme on Early Recovery and Disaster Risk Management Programme in China

outputs.output_descr: To response to Wenchuan Earthquake, with the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia contribution of US$ 1 million, UNDP support shelter rebuilding integrated with sustainable recovery and reconstruction in Beichuan.

With funded by the Government of Norway, in recognition of the potential risks and at the specific request of NDRC, UNDP provided targeted assistance to the Ministry of Water Resources (MRW) and relevant authorities to strengthen the safety of hydraulic facilities. A series of thematic researches and in-situ tests were completed to assess the impact of earthquakes on dams. Through collaborating with international counterparts, national authorities improved their capacity in researching and managing seismic safety of dams and hydropower stations. The experience gained in response to the earthquake also contributed to the modification of national specifications and the emergency management of hydropower projects.

project_title: umbrella program of post-wenchuan earthquake recovery
